text: wqal almshrkwn: hadhih 'ibl wazare hram, la yaklha 'iilaa man yadhnwn lah -hsb adeayhm- min sdnt al'awthan wghyrhm. whdhh 'ibl hurrimt zhwrha, fala yahilu rkwbha walhml ealayha bihal min alahwal. whdhh 'ibl laa yadhkrwn asm allah taealaa ealayha fi 'ayi shan min shywnha. faealuu dhlk kdhbana minhum ealaa allh, sayajzihim allah bsbb maa kanuu yaftarun min kdhb ealayh sbhanh
